A practical improvement of the articles of Christ's descent into hell and rising again from the dead in a sermon, preach'd in the parish church of Bridgewater, on Easter-Day, Anno Domini, 1697 / by William Allen. Allen, William, fl. 1681-1697.
[6], 24 p.
Printed for J. Taylor and J. Miller, London : 1697.
Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
=======
